channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page Builder: KingComposer – Free Drag and Drop page builder by King-Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page Builder: KingComposer – Free Drag and Drop page builder by King-Theme

item.title: CVE-2021-25048|2024-08-03T19:49:14.560Z -- unknown -- page%20builder%3A%20kingcomposer%20%E2%80%93%20free%20drag%20and%20drop%20page%20builder%20by%20king-theme
item.description: The KingComposer WordPress plugin through 2.9.6 does not have authorisation, CSRF and sanitisation/escaping when creating profile, allowing any authenticated users to create arbitrary ones, with Cross-Site Scripting payloads in them
